subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Yani Tseng of Taiwan won the L.P.G.A. Championship Sunday, and in doing so became the youngest player ever to win four L.P.G.A. majors.
snippet: Yani Tseng of Taiwan won the L.P.G.A. Championship Sunday, and in doing so became the youngest player ever to win four L.P.G.A. majors.
